In Julia Louis-Dreyfus: Films: Enough Said and You Hurt My Feelings

…appeared with Will Ferrell in Downhill (2020), a dramedy about a struggling couple on a family vacation. In 2021 Louis-Dreyfus joined the Marvel Cinematic Universe, playing Valentina Allegra de Fontaine in the TV miniseries The Falcon and the Winter Soldier.
